reviews.review_msg: Really good prof! talks a lot during labs but really cares about the subject and her students. I would recommend taking her absolutely! It will be hard, but it's biology so it's going to be a little work heavy no matter what

Mala is one of the best profs at sfu. She truly cares about her students and will explain concepts clearly during her office hours. READ AND REREAD her lecture slides for the quizzes. Overall if you try you have nothing to worry about. the labs were kind of tedious, but the lectures were not bad. Mala has a good sense of humor.
Interesting and funny, made biology interesting, lectures are informative.

She is the sweetest person ever! She is... and Cesar as T.A is the best ever. Makes you understand and complete the knowledge that you couldn't get in class.. her accent is a little heavy but she is the sweetest. Kind of unclear the material in class but overall, very interesting class.

Very sweet lady and very interested in teaching biology. Her accent is REALY hard to understand at times & often she would do experiments in lab but not everyone could see. Emails impossible. she responds briefly, unhelpful, & is annoyed that she had to email u. Dont take her for lecture but 4 lab ask LOTS and LOTS of questions and shes alright.
Tests were hard and the labs were adequate.
The exams aren't difficult if you have a brain.

Very nice teacher, but be prepared to study hard. She gives two quizzes per week. One online, and one in class. Given that there is only one day in between to study for these quizzes, they are extremely hard and specific, making it very unfair

Nicole is a great professor, her lectures are clear and interesting, her exams are fair and fairly comprehensive, and her notes accompanied with her audio-recorded lectures that she posts online make the course easy to follow and also to catch up on if you fall behind.
Tammy is a wonderful teacher!  She is very helpful, and she is able to explain the material very well.  She is also very approachable! One of the nicest professor I have ever had!
The lectuers were hard to understand, but she made it clear for me during her office hours. She is very helpful. Dr.Nicholson however, is not.
He has this weird sneeze/cough that sounds like hes making the sound of one of those kid guns. He is so unclear.. but his tests are pretty easy
The greatest professor, kind and active. Her teaching skill is awesome, there is no student who sleeps in her class, because its really interesting. Not tuff grader. No much homework.
Enthusiastic teacher. Pay attention and do your readings. You'd surely ace d course. Try and be specific when answering essay style questions, else you'd lose mark.
